content.question: Which expression is equal to the resistivity of the material that the resistors are made from?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator pi, script open E, D squared, and denominator 8 I L" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi><mi>Ɛ</mi><msup><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>I</mi><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator pi, script open E, D squared, and denominator 4 I L" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi><mi>Ɛ</mi><msup><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>I</mi><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator pi, script open E, D squared, and denominator 2 I L" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi><mi>Ɛ</mi><msup><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>I</mi><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 pi, script open E, D squared, and denominator I L" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>Ɛ</mi><msup><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>I</mi><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator pi, script open E, D squared, and denominator 2 I L" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi><mi>Ɛ</mi><msup><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>I</mi><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
